org.simulator.sbml
Interface ValueHolder

All Superinterfaces:
DelayValueHolder, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SBMLinterpreter
public interface ValueHolder
extends DelayValueHolder, java.io.Serializable

A ValueHolder is necessary to provide the current values for Compartments, Species, Parameters, and SpeciesReferences at simulation time. It also grants access to the current simulation time. In this way, it is possible to separate the interpretation and simulation of a Model from the pure evaluation of ASTNodes.

Since:
0.9
Version:
$Rev: 147 $
Author:
Andreas Dräger, Roland Keller
